Posts.Content: I have been taking letrozole for a year, following chemo and radio for breast cancer. I suffer from excessive stomach gas. The emissions are so smelly that it is embarassing to go out sometimes. Does anyone else have this? I have been tested for stomach bugs but that is not the cause. 0 likes, 3 replies Report
Posts.Title: A Letrozole side effect - excessive stomach gas.

Posts.Title: A Letrozole side effect - excessive stomach gas.

Posts.Content: Thank you very much Cheryl for your reply. I am grateful to know that I am not the only one with this problem. I will certainly try all of your suggestions. Report
